text: niyayaminri pumiyil karvam kontalaipavarkal nam kattalaikalaip purakkanikkumpatic ceytu vituvom. Akave, avarkal nam attatcikal anaittaiyum (tankal kannal) kantapotilum avarrai nampave mattarkal. Avvare nerana valiyai avarkal kantapotilum avarkal atai (tankal) cellum valiyaka etuttukkolla mattarkal. Eninum, tavarana valiyaik kantalo ataiye (tankal) cellum valiyaka etuttuk kolvarkal. Niccayamaka avarkal nam vacanankalaip poyyakki, avarraip purakkanittu paramukamayiruntate itarkuriya karanamakum
